author: Channing Sargent
title: Carly Rae Jepson chopped and bleached all her hair off and it‚Äôs chic AF
text:
Carly Rae Jepson chopped and bleached all her hair off and it‚Äôs chic AF Who is she!!!??? Carly Rae Jepson debuted a new look Sunday , and girl is unrecognizable.
The 24-year-old Call Me Maybe singer performed during intermission at the 2017 Honda NHL All-Star Game Semifinal #1 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles.
She debuted the new ‚Äòdo while singing the Canadian national anthem. Her locks chopped into a perfect platinum pixie with long bangs, she looks like a veritable Tinkerbell .
‚ÄúLil blonde me about to sing O Canada at the #NHLAllStar game!,‚Äù Carly Rae posted on Instagram.
She‚Äôd already been going shorter over recent months, but was also keeping things dark and vampy.
Motivation: xmas baking. 
A photo posted by Carly Rae Jepsen (@carlyraejepsen) on Dec 15, 2016 at 8:51am PST 
But now, Carly Rae Jepson has lightened it all up. Figuratively, literally, and metaphorically, in our hearts.
Lil blonde me about to sing O Canada at the #NHLAllStar game! ü•Ö 
A photo posted by Carly Rae Jepsen (@carlyraejepsen) on Jan 29, 2017 at 12:23pm PST 
Wethinks that with her busy schedule, she‚Äôs gonna be over the moon with this new ‚Äòdo. The look requires minimal upkeep, if any. She can just wash, towel dry, throw in some pomade, and go.
Hockey buds 
A photo posted by Carly Rae Jepsen (@carlyraejepsen) on Jan 29, 2017 at 6:53pm PST 
We‚Äôre digging it. And with predecessors like Mia Farrow and Michelle Williams , Jepson‚Äôs in good company here.
And she is KILLING the style. It suits her so well, we‚Äôre inclined to take our own locks under the chopping block‚Ä¶again.
We love that her dark roots peep from underneath, offsetting the platinum, and making her look effortlessly sun kissed.
Call us definitely.
